freetext.name: Section 1
freetext.p: Recompiling AndroMDA from the source is quite easy. Unpack andromda-src-*.zip into a directory of your choice. Copy build.properties.sample to build.properties and edit it. Insert the directory where you installed JBoss as a value for the property jboss.home. That's it! Run ant and watch the contents of the "dist" subdirectory!

The same rules apply if you want to compile the CVS version. Checkout the andromda-all module from
AndroMDA CVS
instead of unzipping the released sources, then proceed as before.
